/identifier_product_doi=10.5067/SeaBASS/CLIVAR/DATA001
/received=20081118
/investigators=Stanford_Hooker,Mary_Elizabeth_Russ
/affiliations=Goddard_Space_Flight_Center,SSAI
/contact=Stanford.B.Hooker@nasa.gov,Mary.E.Russ@nasa.gov
! experiment=P01
! cruise=CLIVAR_i6S_KNOX14
/experiment=CLIVAR
/cruise=i06s
/station=NA
/data_file_name=P01_pigment_2008.txt
/documents=P01BiogeochemLog(I6S_CLIVAR).xls,P01_HPL_additional_pigment_data_2008.xls
/calibration_files=missing_calibration.txt
/data_type=pigment
/data_status=preliminary
/start_date=20080206
/end_date=20080308
/start_time=12:20:00[GMT]
/end_time=10:53:00[GMT]
/north_latitude=-33.2289[DEG]
/south_latitude=-68.3642[DEG]
/east_longitude=32.4746[DEG]
/west_longitude=28.0698[DEG]
/cloud_percent=NA
/secchi_depth=NA
/water_depth=NA
/wave_height=NA
/wind_speed=NA
!
! Samples were collected along ~ 30 degree east longitude line from South Africa to Antartica
! Samples were collected under vacuum (~5 psi) and filtered through 25mm GF/F pre-combusted filters and stored at -80 degrees C prior to analysis
! For detailed sampling information, including additional biogeochemical samples collected per station see attached documents
! For pigment sums, pigment ratios, and pigment indices see attached documents
!
/missing=-999
/delimiter=space
/fields=HPL_sample_code,sample,volfilt,station,date,time,depth,lon,lat,Vx,Tot_Chl_a,Tot_Chl_b,Tot_Chl_c,alpha-beta-Car,But-fuco,Hex-fuco,Allo,Diadino,Diato,Fuco,Perid,Zea,Chl_a,DV_Chl_a,Chlide_a,Chl_b,DV_Chl_b,Chl_c1c2,Chl_c3,Lut,Neo,Viola,Phytin_a,Phide_a,Pras,Gyro
/units=none,none,mL,none,yyyymmdd,hh:mm:ss,m,degrees,degrees,mL,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3,mg/m^3
/end_header
